ygData.subject: Re: spell slots
ygData.msgSnippet: well, we ve got a wizard that just started and is around 8, waiting for him to get up levels. we just lost a wizard cause he gave up EQ and sold his account,
ygData.messageBody:
well, we've got a wizard that just started and is around 8, waiting for him
to get up levels. we just lost a wizard cause he gave up EQ and sold his
account, he was lvl 24, and we've got a coupla necros and a druid that are
being built up for later use...

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 17th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 02:43 PM 5/12/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
>Won't be long before your party might want a wizard. Not many other classes
>can do 400+ points of damage to a critter in the first 30 seconds of the
>fight. (And that's just what our wizard is doing at 13th level...)
>

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
